content: a simple 2 color brioche cowl pattern if you ve ever wanted to learn how to work in brioche this is a great beginner project there is a full video tutorial for it here 1 which is the best way to learn if you re new to brioche **materials** * us size 6 4 0 mm circular needles 16 * 55 yards of dk #3 weight yarn in each color * i used featherfin yarn cashmerino 2 in pine & pale pistachio * yarn needle *stitch marker **blocked gauge** 13 5 sts / 27 row = 4 note row gauge for this project is measured by counting the vertical column of v s of each color so 2 worked row = 1 gauge row row gauge is not as important as stitch gauge **measurements one size ** * 26 around * 12 5 tall 1 http //bit ly/kodiakcowl 2 https //www etsy com/shop/featherfinyarn ref=l2-shopheader-name&section_id=21518367
